release_notes.en-US:
Version 10.1.

I changed below.

1) Name of ltnSidebar was changed to calSidebar.
2) Functions of implementation.js were changed from async false to async true.

Upgrades and updates are continued, but new programs would be independent window entity programs. 

Sungho.

From Sungho Hwang.

description.en-US: Version 9.2. updated in 2021-02-15. Logo background color of folder pane box was changed to complete dynamic color. Version 9.5. updated in 2021-03-31. I changed today subpane on left bottom to clock. Version 9.7. updated in 2021-04-01. 1) I present dynamic rainbow themes on left today subpane and clock. 2) I fixed AM to PM after 12 o'clock. Version 9.8. updated in 2021-04-23. Rounded border edge of browserAction popup window was cut from Thunderbird version 89.0a1. So, I deleted the border of the window body. Would you update this version? send a gift to a friend Eunjo. About all-day persistence of this program. If not closing operating system, please, use Minimize on close. [Next improvements] 1) Would you recommend improvements for next version? And, I am not a supported developer. Would you contribute some to me for continuous developments. I have happy dreams by one dollar and fifty cents, like an international postage in minimum not a cup of coffee in high price.
description.ko: Version 9.2. updated in 2021-02-15. Logo background color of folder pane box was changed to complete dynamic color. Version 9.5. updated in 2021-03-31. I changed today subpane on left bottom to clock. Version 9.7. updated in 2021-04-01. 1) I present dynamic rainbow themes on left today subpane and clock. 2) I fixed AM to PM after 12 o'clock. Version 9.8. updated in 2021-04-23. Rounded border edge of browserAction popup window was cut from Thunderbird version 89.0a1. So, I deleted the border of the window body. Would you update this version? send a gift to a friend Eunjo. About all-day persistence of this program. If not closing operating system, please, use Minimize on close. [Next improvements] 1) Would you recommend improvements for next version? And, I am not a supported developer. Would you contribute some to me for continuous developments. I have happy dreams by one dollar and fifty cents, like an international postage in minimum not a cup of coffee in high price.

summary.en-US:
Append today subpane to left top or append logo or clock to left bottm.

send a gift to a friend Eunjo.

Updated as of 2021-03-31.
Updated as of 2021-08-04 for Thunderbird version 90s.
summary.ko:
왼쪽편에 투데이 서브페인과 로고, 시계를 추가해 보세요.

친구 은조에게 선물로 보내며.

개발자 황성호.
